presidentReport: December meeting and our annual holiday celebration! Thanks to everyone who brought food and helped with setup. We had a very successful year with increased membership and strong participation in club activities. Looking forward to 2025.
vicePresidentReport: Tonight we're doing our annual show-and-tell. Members are encouraged to share their favorite radio projects from the year. We have some impressive homebrew equipment and interesting QSL cards to display.

committeeReports.report: The holiday party will start immediately following the business meeting. We have food, drinks, and a white elephant gift exchange planned. Donations for the food bank are being collected at the door.
We gained 8 new members this year bringing our total membership to 47. Retention rate is excellent at 92%. Working on a new member welcome packet for 2025.

oldBusiness: Club library catalog now available online
Year-end financial audit scheduled for January
newBusiness: Election of officers for 2025 - nominations open
Approval of 2025 budget - will be voted on at January meeting
Discussion of club awards for outstanding members
announcements: Holiday party follows immediately after meeting
No VE session in December - resumes January 7th
Club station closed during holidays - reopens January 2nd
Next general meeting: January 8th at 7:00 PM
